addLayer(PAGLayer) - 类 中的方法org.libpag.PAGComposition
Add PAGLayer to current PAGComposition at the top.
addLayerAt(PAGLayer, int) - 类 中的方法org.libpag.PAGComposition
Add PAGLayer to current PAGComposition at the specified index.
addListener(PAGView.PAGViewListener) - 类 中的方法org.libpag.PAGView
Adds a PAGViewListener to the set of listeners that are sent events through the life of an animation, such as start, end repeat, and cancel.
addPAGFlushListener(PAGView.PAGFlushListener) - 类 中的方法org.libpag.PAGView
Adds a PAGFlushListener to the set of listeners that are sent events when pag flush called.
applyFill - 类 中的变量org.libpag.PAGText
When true, the text layer shows a fill.
applyStroke - 类 中的变量org.libpag.PAGText
When true, the text layer shows a stroke.
audioBytes() - 类 中的方法org.libpag.PAGComposition
The audio data of this composition, which is an AAC audio in an MPEG-4 container.
audioMarkers() - 类 中的方法org.libpag.PAGComposition
Returns the audio markers of this composition.
audioStartTime() - 类 中的方法org.libpag.PAGComposition
Indicates when the first frame of the audio plays in the composition's timeline.
